document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Southeast Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Southeast Asia

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trombicula mediocris Kawamura & Yamaguchi, 1921: 186
, pl. IV (1–7), V (1–7), VI (1, 2).

Trombicula hatorii Womersley & Heaslip, 1943: 92
, pl. V (5) (new name for
T. pseudoakamushi Hatori, 1920
).

Trombicula (Eutrombicula) wichmanni var. tinghuensis Liang, Lo and Hwang, 1957: 223
, pl. II (6–12).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts. RODENTIA :
Bandicota indica , Berylmys bowersi , Bullimus bagobus , Dremomys pernyi , Menetes berdmorei , Rattus andamanensis , R. everetti , R. exulans , R. losea , R. nitidus , R. norvegicus , R. rattus , R. tanezumi , Sundamys muelleri
; LAGOMORPHA :
Lepus peguensis peguensis
; SCANDENTIA :
Tupaia glis
; ARTIODACTYLA:
Bos taurus indicus , Bubalus bubalis , Capra hircus , Muntiacus muntjak vaginalis , Sus scrofa cristatus , Tragulus napu napu
; PERISSODACTYLA :
Tapirus indicus
; CARNIVORA :
Canis lupus familiaris , Felis catus
; PRIMATES :
Homo sapiens
; SQUAMATA :
Draco volans , Eutropis multicarinata , E. multifasciata , Fowlea piscator , Gekko gecko , Lygosoma
sp.,
Physignathus cocincinus , Ptyas korros , Varanus dumerilii , V. flavescens
; AVES :
Centropus bengalensis , C. bengalensis javanensis , C. bengalensis lignator , C. sinensis intermedius , Copsychys saularis prosthopellus, Erythropitta erythrogaster , Gallus gallus domesticus , Goura cristata , Gracula religiosa , Ixobrychus sinensis sinensis , Larvivora cyanea , Monticola solitarius , Rallus aquaticus , Spilopelia chinensis hainana , Turnix suscitator atrogularis
.
Distribution. Australia , Burma , Brunei , China , Guam , Indonesia , Japan , Malaysia , Papua New Guinea , Philippines , Taiwan , Thailand , Vietnam .
